title: How Solar Got Cheap
description: For a long time, only rich people could afford to put solar panels on the roof. Not anymore. Here's what changed.
copyright: Copyright 2015-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
itunes:title: How Solar Got Cheap
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: Solar energy used to be a fantasy. Then it arrived, but was too expensive for most people to afford. Now it's cheap. Here's how it happened.
itunes:subtitle: Solar energy used to be a fantasy. Then it arrived, but was too expensive for most people to afford. Now it's cheap. Here's how it happened.
content:encoded: For a long time, only rich people could afford to put solar panels on the roof. Not anymore. Here's what changed.
